snippet: Shiite Muslim rebels captured Omran, one of the main cities in northern Yemen, on Tuesday, a local official and residents said, putting them on the outskirts of the capital.
abstract: Shiite Muslim rebels reportedly capture Omran, one of the main cities in northern Yemen; it is a blow to government of Pres Abdu Rabbu Mansour Hadi, who has been trying to stabilize the country after nearly three years of turmoil.
lead_paragraph: Shiite Muslim rebels captured Omran, one of the main cities in northern Yemen, on Tuesday, a local official and residents said, putting them on the outskirts of the capital.

headline.main: Yemen: Houthi Rebels Seize a Northern City
headline.print_headline: Yemen: Houthi Rebels Seize a Northern City
